code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Portfolio(_ref){let{profiles}=_ref;const getIdFromName=name=>name.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g,"-");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"portfolio",className:"flex flex-col items-center mt-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-6xl tracking-wider mb-10",children:"PORTFOLIO"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-10 justify-center",children:Object.keys(profiles).map((name,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative flex flex-col items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`#${getIdFromName(name)}`,className:"w-40 h-52 border-8 border-[#333] shadow-lg bg-white relative animate-swing origin-top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profiles[name].image,alt:name,className:"w-full h-full object-cover"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mt-3 text-[#ffcc70] font-bold",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-300",children:profiles[name].role.join(", ")})]},idx))})]});}export default Portfolio;
